entry.title: Lumia Laser - Liquid Sky Effect Aurora Red/Green Laser with Blue LED
entry.summary:
Vendor: DragonX
Type: Laser Lights
Price: 219.90

 

 

Lumia Wizard 3D laser projector featuring a unique green and red laser web effect combined with a deep-blue LED ripple effect. It’s extremely portable and lightweight - only 1.5Kg (3.3 pounds). The layered colored textures create a mesmerizing projection effect for walls, ceilings or any surface. It’s a fantastic lumia/ripple effect laser for small clubs, bars and the mobile performer. This Aurora laser lights provides a unique experience with its trippy web effects delivered in red, green, and violet-blue.

Main Features:
  • 150mW 650nm Red + 50mW 532nm Green + 5W 450nm Royal Blue LED
  • Liquid sky effect laser creates a soothing night sky atmosphere with ever-changing laser web patterns.
  • Similar to Chauvet cirrus laser but two times more powerful!
  • Nebula laser filling any room from 500 sf. bedroom up to 2,000 sqaure feet ballroom.
  • Versatile plug-and-play fixture with separate controls for lasers and LED.
  • Blanket any room with a colorful web of red, green and blue.
  • Wide coverage 160º angle.
  • DMX 512 (7 CH) available for even more customized shows.

entry.title: Holographic Laser Star Projector - Twilight Stars with Blue LED Wash
entry.summary:
Vendor: DragonX
Type: Laser Lights
Price: 219.90

 

 

 

MoonStar Wizard Twilight laser strar projector is the first laser projector integrated with high power LED effect. With SCM stepper control system, high power LED LEN group performs the big diffracted angle and averages power burst grating of laser. This unique laser effect is the perfect tool for creating a background atmosphere in a bar, lounge or entrance to a club. Its blue LED and widespread cluster effect can be tailored to suit a specific environment or create a certain mood via the easy-to-use rear control panel.

Main Features:
  • Holographic Laser stars projector light show: thousands red/green stars with blue LED back wash.
  • 150mW 650nm Red + 50mW 532nm Green (10 times more powerful than other models in market)
  • Wide coverage: from 500 sf. bedroom up to 3,000 sqaure feet ballroom.
  • Energy saving: only 15W power consumption!
  • Holographic technology creating nebula cloud.
  • Simple to Use 4 Auto Modes: Auto slow effects, fast effects, sound-actived moving effects, random effects.
  • LED control panel on the back: change red/green laser strobe frequency, Blue background effect moving speed, laser dots moving speed etc. Unlimited combinations to create your own star light show.
  • DMX 512 (7 CH) and Master/slave available for even more customized shows.

entry.title: Hawk-1RGB Laser Projector-Full Color compact ILDA 25kpps
entry.summary:
Vendor: DragonX
Type: Laser Lights
Price: 1499.90

Hawk-1RGB 1W pure diode animation laser. RGB laser projector with Red: 200mW 635nm, Green: 200mW 520nm, Blue: 600mW 450nm

Brand new version of most popular high-performance 1000mw RGB laser light. This ultra-compact and lightweight model can fit in any place for temporary laser shows or stage effect lighting. Although compact, it's good enough for large venues of 800-1200 people capacity: this one will rock the whole space for an amazing light beam show. With a fog machine, you can see the beams crystal clear in air.

This show laser light provides an analog modulation. It means a better color fading and a much broader color hue. These facts make the Hawk-1RGB ideal for all applications requiring many different colors and color transitions.

Besides the high quality laser diodes (6,000 hours lifetime), this laser has 25kpps high-speed optical scanner built in. Together with ILDA software QuickShow. This unit is capable for projecting complicated logo animation, cartoon character or movie effects.  

Main features of this RGB laser show equipment:

  • 25Kpps scanner with optical scanning angle ± 20 °.
  • Control over pre-programmed effects / SD card files via DMX.
  • Control modes: Music / Auto / DMX 12CH / ILDA PC / Master-slave / SD-Card.
  • 100+ pre-programmed colorful graphics and beam patterns on 2GB SD card. Download any ILDA laser files to SD card and project instantly.
  • Operate with any ILDA-compatible controller. Works great with this Quickshow 2.0 FB3 Laser Show Designer Software.
  • Analog modulated RGB laser with thousands of 
  • Certified to comply with all US FDA safety standards:switchable scan fail safety (single beam protection), safety key-switch and remote interlock.
  • Dimensions (LxWxH):7.1"x11.0"x8.7" (18x28x22cm) • Weight: 11.0 lbs (5 kg)

entry.title: Hawk-1P Purple / Pink laser light: red+blue mixing pink laser
entry.summary:
Vendor: DragonX
Type: Laser Lights
Price: 699.90

Hawk-1P Pink Laser mixed by blue and red laser diodes (high end 635nm red diode with better color visibility and beam shape).  The laser color can be purple/pink depends on the background lighting.

The Hawk 1P is a real single color pink laser unit with a total output power of up to 1000mW (converted power value). Unlike other purple/pink lasers in the market, which typically use single 405nm Purple DPSS diode. This model combine 470nm blue with high-end 635nm red to get a brighter purple which is close to pink. The mixing color delivers higher visibility and brightness than the single purple diode ones.

At the same time this unit offers a galvo system with up to 25kpps as well as a scan angle of up to 40° (±20°). It comes with 100+ pre-stored laser shows on the 2GB SD-Card suitable for weddings, Christmas, Halloween, birthdays etc. 

Main Features: 

  • Designed for pink laser light show with 6 modes:Sound, Auto-Beam, Auto-Animation, DMX512 (18 CH), Master/Slave, SD-Card.
  • Pink laser beam combined by high end built 200mW 635nm red laser diode and 400mW 470nm blue laser diode.
  • Applicable places: disco, clubs, home parties, halloween parties, concerts, stage, roller skating rinks, home theaters etc.
  • Comply with all US FDA safety standards: switchable scan fail safety (single beam protection), safety key-switch and remote interlock.
  • Linkable via 3-pin XLR cable (for DMX or Master-slave linking). 
  • Dimensions (LxWxH):7.1"x11.0"x8.7" (18x28x22cm) •  Weight: 14.3 lbs (6.5kg)

entry.title: Hawk-1G 500mW 520nm Compact green laser projector 25kpps ILDA
entry.summary:
Vendor: DragonX
Type: Laser Lights
Price: 1299.90

 

Hawk-1G 500mW 520nm pure diode Green Laser Light Show Compact Projector

The Hawk 1G is a green single color laser projection system with a total output power of up to 500mW. The 520nm pure diode ensures a high visibility and brightness. It provides more stable performance, longer lifetime and superior color rendering compared to traditional DPSS 532nm green.  The galvo system is up to 25kpps with a scan angle of up to 40° (±20°): all you need for a fantastic green laser show. As other units in Hawk1 series, it has a ILDA interface for professional computer control. About 200 preset basic patterns, like layers, tunnels, fences, waves etc. can be controlled via DMX. 

Main Features: 
  • Animated laser lights produced by 25kpps high speed scanner, ILDA controllable.
  • High end built 500mW 520nm pure green laser diode.
  • Designed for green laser light show with 6 modes:Sound, AUTO, DMX512 (18 CH), ILDA PC, Master/Slave, SD-Card.
  • Compact green laser for places like bars, clubs, concert, nightclubs. Or as side fill projector at private parties or theaters.
  • 2GB SD Card with 100+ pre-stored laser show files. Download other laser show .ILDA files to SD Card and project instantly.
  • For the sound-to-light mode the sensitivity of the integrated adjustable microphone can be altered.
  • Dimensions (LxWxH):7.1"x11.0"x8.7" (18x28x22cm) • Weight: 14.3 lbs (6.5kg)

entry.title: Hawk 6 - 6W RGB High Power Laser Show Projector
entry.summary:
Vendor: DragonX
Type: Laser Lights
Price: 5799.00

 

DragonX Hawk 6 series high power RGB laser projector: 6 Watt 30kpps - Red: 1200mW 637nm, Green: 1600mW 520nm, Blue: 3200mW 445nm. 

The Hawk 6 laser systems combine extreme power with very high accuracy and super small size. This makes it suitable for any kind of application - fixed installations, mobile use, multimedia projects, long distance outdoor applications and extra precise graphics projections. 

Main features: 

  • Laser show projector built with state of art 520nm pure green laser diode: stable output and better lifetime compared to traditional 532nm green.
  • Pure RGB diode: great linear color fading behavior.
  • The 637nm diode ensures a brilliant and ultra bright red with sharp drawing patterns. Excellent build as laser image projector for outdoor advertising or promotions.
  • FDA compliant with all secure features.
  • Beam Divergence <1mrad at="" full="" angle="" li="">
  • Beam Diameter < 4.5 mm
  • Modulation : >50KHz Analog.

entry.title: Cartoon Laser for home/commercial Logo animation
entry.summary:
Vendor: DragonX
Type: Laser Lights
Price: 229.90

 

Animation laser light machine with Red/green/yellow color. Cartoon laser stage projector perfectly for home party, Christmas, DJs, Disco lights, nightclubs and company promotion events.

Main Features:

  • 160mW SD Card Laser Light projector comes with MINI ILDA Laser Show software .
  • 15Kpps scanning laser with various pre-programmed patterns.
  • Big Dipper high quality optics. Red laser beam> 100 mW, Green laser beam> 60 mW. Long lasting solid state laser diode built in.
  • DIY patterns can be created and programmed via any ILDA-enabled software. The data can be stored on an SD card and inserted into the laser light machine.
  • Easy guide to create your own logo and text in software and project it on walls.
  • Company logo, store promotion exhibition. Widely used for commercial and promotion events.
  • Advertising effectiveness is enormous, when the laser illumination is shining, it soon attracts attention from people walking on the street.
  • Control Modes: Program / ILDA / Audio / Auto. The laser will play pre-programmed cartoon in program mode. ILDA Mode: ILDA play mode, circularly shows a single ILDA files (file extension ILDA, not case-sensitive), the second line displays the current playback ILDA file name, press "UP" and "DOWN" to change the ILDA file, press the DIR key change the current working folder.
  • Micro-controllable high speed step motor: ±15° big angle scanning.

entry.title: 300mW RGB Text Laser Projector With Keyboard
entry.summary:
Vendor: DragonX
Type: Laser Lights
Price: 429.90

 

The Party Buzzer RGB text projector is a high-powered and portable laser that will instantly project letters, words and sentences as fast as you can write them. This saves you from purchasing a separate laser and expensive computer with laser-editing software to achieve the same result.

PartyBuzzer comes with a keyboard, so you can simply plug in to edit or write messages. It’s easy to use and impressive to show off in a range of businesses, events or parties.

Main Features:

  • RGB laser writer for convinient laser text display
  • Use the included keyboard to create custom text messages and apply different rotation effects
  • Manual size adjustment perfect for venues, large and small
  • Looks great with or without fog
  • Laser Power: 50mW-Green(532nm) + 100mW-Red(650nm) + 150mW-Blue(450nm)
  • Control Mode:Keyboard, iphone App
  • Bulit-in modes: Text Editing, Auto Beam Show, Sound to Light Beam Show, Laser Clock, Countdown
  • Energy saving: only 15W power consumption!
  • Sync to music and use wide range of animation effects
  • Package include: laser projector, keyboard, power adaptor, 2m keyboard extension cord.
